thread.section_title: ao.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.ao.com
thread.title: Ed Marks

author: Ed Marks
title: Ed Marks
text: I had to buy a new fridge-freezer as my (very) old one died. I chose one online, from an easily-navigable website, and was offered a choice of delivery options. I was surprised to receive a phone call soon after placing the order, to confirm details. The delivery was exactly as promised, and I was kept informed of progress by text and email. For a small extra charge, the old unit was taken away. I would definitely recommend this company.
